name: Ch.6BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Franz;Miss Lute!|May we take a minute of your time, please?
speak;Lute;Oh?|What would you two have in need of?
speak;Franz;We saw how you were using such amazing magic on the battlefield!|We were wondering if you could teach us some!|We have never seen such magic up this close until now.
speak;Lute;Oh, that magic?|It's just a basic spell that any mage can use.|If you study from a book, it should be as easy as breathing.
speak;Neimi;We were really hoping you could teach us!
speak;Lute;...Hmmm...|I'm not sure it would be worthy of my time...
speak;Artur;I think you should help them Lute.|You could also benefit from teaching them.
speak;Lute;What could I possibly learn that's not in a book?!
speak;Franz;I could train you some of the Renais knights' training regiments.|It's guaranteed to make you stronger!
speak;Lute;I have no interest in such things!
speak;Artur;How about I let you have this tome I bought if you help them out?
speak;Artur;I think this will benefit you all.
speak;Lute;It better be worth that book...
alert;Franz's MAG growth has increased by 25!
alert;Neimi's MAG growth has increased by 25!
alert;Lute's STR growth has increased by 25!
